Title: Orchard Foundation Theme
Description:
Orchard Theme Project:  In-Progress

Simple theme for Orchard CMS, the theme can be used and customized very easily, the theme was created using Orchard 1.7.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Foundation

The theme currently uses Foundation 4. Foundation is an advanced responsive front-end framework. Learn more about Foundation.

Orchard CMS

Orchard is a free, open source, community-focused Content Management System built on the ASP.NET MVC platform. Learn more about Orchard.

About

Based on previous Version of Foundation here which was not completed, I intend to update to Orchard 1.7 and include features seen in other themes.

I have already fixed the menu and on our demo site you will be able to track progress. here

This is a foundation 4 based theme for Orchard CMS v1.7 Foundation is an advanced responsive front-end framework (http://foundation.zurb.com/).

It is based on the original The Theme Machine theme for Orchard. It utilizes the responsive capabilities of Foundation 4 to give you a really advanced responsive theme for Orchard.
